dialog: Hi Marie! Did you just finish class?
Yes, I'm so ready for the weekend.
Yeah me too… Oh, who is your friend?
So sorry! I forgot you haven't met. This is Trey. We've been collaborating on our English project for a couple of weeks. Trey, this is my roommate.
Hello! It's nice to meet you.
I've never had a gay best friend before. Isn't he so stylish, roomie?

instructions: Please rate the below dialogue snippet on Marie's intention and the effect on Trey.

dialog: Of course. So… now that we've all met, Trey, as my new gay best friend, maybe you could join my roomie and me for a shopping trip this Saturday? If that's okay with you of course.
I don't know, Marie. I was planning on taking my dog to the park that day.
Oh come on! You won't be playing with your dog all day, right? Besides, I know you'll love it. We'll even go out for pedicures before then.
Hmm… that does sound nice, but I haven't really done pedicures before.
Oh really?! Then you've got to try it.
